Structs/RouterView.html#/s:12INNavigatio.name: init()
Structs/RouterView.html#/s:12INNavigatio.abstract: Initializes a new root router view which handles any transitions via the router.

Structs/RouterView.html.name: RouterView
Structs/RouterView.html.abstract: The root view which wrapps a NavigationStack and a vertical navigation modifier

Protocols/Route.html.name: Route
Protocols/Route.html.abstract: A route is a represenation of a screen which can be passed

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12INNavig.name: sheet
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12INNavig.abstract: The screen will be shown in a sheet which covers only partially the screen.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12INNavig.name: fullScreen
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12INNavig.abstract: The screen will be shown modally covering the whole screen.

Enums/PresentationType.html.name: PresentationType
Enums/PresentationType.html.abstract: The type how to show a vertical navigation.

Enums/RouterSleep.html.name: RouterSleep
Enums/RouterSleep.html.abstract: The different times to wait for a transition animation

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: numberOfPushedViews
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Returns the number of routes in the current horizontal path stack.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: init(root:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Initializes the router with a root view representation.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: set(routes:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Sets multiple routes at once replacing the current path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: push(_:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Adds a new view to the horizontal path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: pop()
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Removes the last view in the current horizontal path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: popToRoot()
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Removes all views from the current horizontal path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: popAfter(index:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Removes all views from the current horizontal path after the given index.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: present(_:type:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Adds a new view to the vertical path which will be the root for the new horizontal path.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: multiPopToRoot()
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Performs multiple pop calls and waits between each step to have them animated.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: multiDismissToRoot()
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Removes all vertical paths one after another animated.

Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.name: dismissToRootAndPresent(_:type:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:12INNavigation6Ro.abstract: Dismisses all vertical paths each after another animated and then presents a new route.

Classes/Router.html.name: Router
Classes/Router.html.abstract: The router which provides a functional interface for the navigation between screens.
